name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a seasoned Senior DevOps Engineer with 8+ years of experience in software engineering, I excel in implementing and managing scalable and reliable systems using a robust tech stack that includes **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Kubernetes**, **Linux**, **Cassandra**, **Elasticsearch**, **Druid**, **Kafka**, **Hazelcast**, **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **ELK**, **Github Actions**, and **ArgoCD**. I specialize in automating infrastructure, monitoring system performance, and optimizing deployment pipelines. My proficiency encompasses building microservices architecture and developing secure REST/gRPC APIs using **Python** frameworks such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**, while ensuring effective database management and optimization with **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**. I am dedicated to delivering high-performance solutions and enhancing operational efficiencies in dynamic environments, particularly within the e-commerce, financial, and healthcare sectors.
